snippet.title: 30 in 30: Kings not satisfied, hungry for second Cup
snippet.description: to the challenges of having a target on your back and dealing with that. That rhymed with some of the things that I had been told." Lombardi is talking about conversations he had last summer with champions in other sports. He spoke with John McVay, the chief executive who presided over four Super Bowl championships with the San Francisco 49ers from 1982-90. Lombardi met with former 49ers safety Ronnie Lott...
